title: Tourmaline Splendor: Contemporary Haaram with a Traditional Heart
features: A modern take on the classic Haaram, this necklace features a delightful color palette of Green, Pink and Purple tourmalines. The tourmalines are masterfully set with Polki diamonds in a floral-inspired design that is both striking and elegant. The graduated pendant design with a central square cut stone and teardrop-shaped stone ensures a bold yet sophisticated look. The piece showcases exceptional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with contemporary sensibilities.
occasions: and upscale social events. Can be paired with Kanjeevaram silk sarees or contemporary gowns for a striking look.
description: This necklace is a statement piece that seamlessly blends tradition and modernity. The use of high-quality, multi-colored tourmalines makes it truly unique. The Polki diamonds add a touch of regal charm, and the impeccable craftsmanship ensures that it will be treasured for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural luster, creating a timeless appeal.
